subject: PLEASE FURNISH ME WITH THE REQUESTED INFORMATION
body:
Please furnish me with your information as requested to enable me proceed
with the preparation of memorandum as one of the document needed for the
transaction thereafter, you will understand how the transaction will be
going.

In addition, the security company does not have much work to they are only
there to direct us on how we can process the release of our fund. In
response to the documents, as soon as I receive your information, I will
prepare an agreement that you will sign and send back to me a coy of the
signed agreement before I will proceed to secure the legal documents in
your name from the court.

Please you don't to worry on how everything will be processed all I need
from you is for you to furnish me your information to enable us proceed
with the claim. Thank you in anticipation for your cooperation and
understanding as I await to receive your information, have a wonderful
weekend.

Regards,

Adanson Hilbert.



---------- Forwarded message ---------
From: Amy <bx54678@***.com>
Date: Tue, Feb 6, 2024 at 10:34â€¯PM
Subject: Re: KINDLY GET BACK TO ME AS SOON AS POSSIBLE
To: <barrisad.hbt5454@gmail.com>





Dear Barr. Adanson Hilbert,

Thank you for your detailed explanation. It's quite an interesting
situation, isn't it? I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds
of matters, but I'm eager to learn more.

You mentioned that the money is currently in a Security Company. Could you
tell me more about this company? How does it work and what kind of security
measures do they have in place?

Also, you said that we will need to process some documents on my name as
the next of kin. What kind of documents are these exactly? And how long
does this process usually take?

I'm sorry for all the questions, but as I said before, this is all new to
me and I want to make sure I understand everything correctly.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.
Best wishes,
Amy
